inputs.description: The URL of your Elasticsearch instance (e.g., https://my-deployment.es.us-east-1.aws.found.io or http://localhost:9200)
Your Elastic API key. You can create an API key in the Kibana Management section under Security > API Keys.
(Optional) Set to 'true' to enable Stage 2 NER-based PII redaction via AWS Comprehend. Leave blank to use regex-only redaction (no AWS credentials required).
(Optional) AWS region for Comprehend calls (e.g. us-east-1, eu-west-1). Leave blank to default to us-east-1.
(Optional) AWS access key ID for Comprehend. Leave blank to use the default AWS credential chain (~/.aws/credentials, IAM role, etc.).
(Optional) AWS secret access key for Comprehend. Leave blank to use the default AWS credential chain.
